long_description: Perfect as a sun guard or layering piece, the Level Six Venus Rashguard for women offers a stretchy fit with excellent comfort for playing in the waves. Quick-drying fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, resists salt water and chlorine and features flat seams for reduced chafing. Fabric paneling enhances freedom of motion.
short_description: Perfect as a sun guard or layering piece, the Level Six Venus Rashguard for women offers a stretchy fit with excellent comfort for playing in the waves.
